item.description:
How about a nice hike in the Blue Hills this weekend? Let's start at the Houghtons pond parking area and traverse the blue skyline loop. From there we'll add another few miles by adding the middle section of the skyline and some side trails.

The Hike
Please plan for a hike with plenty of ups and downs. This will be away from any paved walkways and on rocky terrain. This hike may not be for the beginner. Be ready for at least 3 miles and 600 feet of elevation change.

Please wear appropriate footwear. I cannot over-emphasize the importance of sturdy footwear. I strongly reccomend hiking shoes or boots.

Bring enough water and snacks for you and your pets.

As always I will adjust the hike for the needs of the group. Please let me know if you have any questions. I can always be reached via email.
item.how_to_find_us: I'm the tall guy with the Green Chevy pickup.
item.name: A Morning Hike in The Blue Hills
